theme_fields.name: scss
head_tag
theme_fields.value:
<script type="text/discourse-plugin" version="0.8.24">
    // admonition info block
    api.decorateCooked($cooked => $cooked.find('blockquote > p strong:contains("info")').each(function(){
        $(this).closest('blockquote').attr('data-admonition', 'info');
        $(this).text($(this).text().replace(/info : /gi, ''));
    }));
    
    // admonition warning block
    api.decorateCooked($cooked => $cooked.find('blockquote > p strong:contains("warning")').each(function(){
        $(this).closest('blockquote').attr('data-admonition', 'warning');
        $(this).text($(this).text().replace(/warning : /gi, ''));
    }));
</script>
